input.sentences: it was a damp 4th of july .
unfortunately | some of the fireworks only sputtered .
a few did n't even take flight .
dampness made it difficult but the technicians persisted .
finally | they achieved a dazzling display .
output.sentences: There was a murder last 4th of July.
They still haven't caught the murderer.
They looked for weeks for him.
They still had fireworks go off this 4th of July.
